card1.title: All in One
card1.description: Discover various places of Trabzon in a single application. Your comprehensive guide for a seamless travel experience.

card2.title: AI Integrated
card2.description: Utilize artificial intelligence to enrich your experience with personalized recommendations, city information, and more.

card3.title: User-Friendly
card3.description: Enjoy the benefits of a thoughtfully designed seamless city guide application. Smooth interactions for easy navigation, an intuitive interface, and a delightful Trabzon experience designed with you in mind.
